alert.note: Alert for Aurora (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:27PM MDT until June 30 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR AURORA COUNTY... At 826 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of White Lake to near Plankinton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plankinton, White Lake, Stickney, Storla and Aurora Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
